descriptionHtml:
I do not understand English. 
This sentence is written by machine translation. 

This mod adds Gray-Mane rifle to the game.

Dawnguard IS required.

You do the console command \"help rifle\" and get it. 
Made craftable skyforge
rifle Steel category Requires steel smithing perk.Gray-Mane rifle.
bullet Steel category

Enjoy!


 zaczac1234?was better english translation. Thanks.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24606/



Credits
mahty made this mod. 

Permission
You may make new mod for this mod to origin. 
I am glad when the name of mahty is then put into a credit. 

Update
1.0
release
manufactured in skyforge Steel rifle.
the best blacksmith Eorlund GrayMane was analyzed Dwemer technology.

1.1
added a rifle case .
apply steelarrow textures.
author: mahty
